channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Secret Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Secret Server

item.title: CVE-2020-4324|2024-08-04T08:00:07.384Z -- ibm -- security%20secret%20server
item.description: IBM Security Secret Server proir to 10.9 could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper input validation. IBM X-Force ID: 177515.

item.title: CVE-2020-4323|2024-08-04T08:00:07.385Z -- ibm -- security%20secret%20server
item.description: IBM Security Secret Server 10.7 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 177514.

item.title: CVE-2020-4322|2024-08-04T08:00:07.562Z -- ibm -- security%20secret%20server
item.description: IBM Security Secret Server 10.7 could allow a remote attacker to hijack the clicking action of the victim. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to hijack the victim's click actions and possibly launch further attacks against the victim. IBM X-Force ID: 177511.

item.title: CVE-2020-4342|2024-08-04T08:00:06.976Z -- ibm -- security%20secret%20server
item.description: IBM Security Secret Server 10.7 could disclose sensitive information included in installation files to an unauthorized user. IBM X-Force ID: 178182.

item.title: CVE-2020-4341|2024-08-04T08:00:07.567Z -- ibm -- security%20secret%20server
item.description: IBM Security Secret Server 10.7 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 178181.

item.title: CVE-2020-4327|2024-08-04T08:00:07.573Z -- ibm -- security%20secret%20server
item.description: IBM Security Secret Server 10.7 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 177599.

item.title: CVE-2020-4340|2024-08-04T08:00:07.548Z -- ibm -- security%20secret%20server
item.description: IBM Security Secret Server prior to 10.9 could allow an attacker to bypass SSL security due to improper certificate validation. IBM X-Force ID: 178180.
